title: Solo/Duo Queue now live in OCE
body:
Yo! We've already pushed out Solo/Duo Queue to Garena regions and, as of today, we're releasing it in OCE as well. We’re being cautious with it because we want to make sure we don’t see the same launch issues as Flex. 

Good luck on the climb =D

https://media.giphy.com/media/3osxYaZU8dek0F9LVK/giphy.gif

replies.body:
I made a post yesterday requesting it.

Just want to say Thankyou! for releasing it

Means alot.

http://giphy.com/gifs/IJh7A8kfN47Ze
NA will love to hear it'll be there soon :D (granted there are no issues that crop up here)

The_Cactopus has a graph for that

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/5cvmhs/soloq_wont_come_out_today/

http://imgur.com/a/9mErK
why is my face the thumbnail here

Oh Draggles good timing. The post [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/NzaqEm3e/d/V361v6AO?comment=0013) where you said VO replacement modification was not currently being banned was deleted so I've lost a reference. *If the stance has not changed*, if you could say so we have a new source to cite that would be much appreciated.

I was trying to follow the link on [Wuks's post here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/5dmkJinG-3rd-party-applicationsmodifications-whats-allowed-and-what-isnt) which quoted you. His post was recently referenced in an Ask Riot article, so in light of its increased visibility making sure all the quotes are still up to date is recommended imo.
Ah not sure haha, for some reason when I linked directly to the comment Cactopus made it used your twitter image in the reddit thread.
from 1300mmr to bronze 4 off 7/10 wins? what the actual? can someone please explain to me how this is even possible?

Alright, on my fresh 30 account that I've had for a while but never player in ranked, I decided to do my solo/duo queue provisional games. So far I have won 6-0 and have 4 games left. I am getting put with Bronze 5s even though I am constantly carrying, getting S-, S and S+. I hope this is a bug and don't want my newest account to be placed in this low elo as I've been doing my best to win every game and have done so. Please give me an update as I am scared to do my next 4 games as I don't want to be placed in this low elo.

Kind Regards,
StephanieoHj.
